/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. The buildings that flank the street are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
